articles.description: Economists, who had been expecting an additional rate hike of 75-100 basis points over the next three quarters in India, now say the RBI could go for additional rate hike of up to 125 basis points this fiscal, taking the overall rate hike to over 200 basis po…
articles.content: Experts say that the aggressive Fed rate hike of 75 basis points is likely to push the Reserve Bank of India for more rate hikes in the coming two or three quarters, and thereby will have a direct be… [+2724 chars]

articles.author: Rica Bhattacharyya
articles.title: Blue collar job openings rise the most in 18 months - Economic Times
articles.description: Economists and job market experts are of the view that the recent rise in the number of Covid-19 infections in the country and fears of a possible fourth wave is not likely to deter companies strengthening their teams in the near-term amid pickup in business …
articles.content: India's blue and grey-collar job markets recorded the highest demand for manpower in one-and-a-half years last month amid opening up of services activity, pickup in consumption, rising attrition, and… [+2511 chars]

articles.author: Vivek Wadhwa
articles.title: Why India’s electric cars will eat Tesla’s lunch - Fortune
articles.description: A former Tesla fan is breaking up with Elon Musk, and waiting eagerly for cheaper, more advanced EVs from Tata and Mahindra.
